name: The In'rr Castle
description:
In a far, far away land. There was an establishment called the ''In'rr Castle''. Rumor has it that it's the most sacred and populated place in the whole continent. But even a perfect place like that have some mysteries.

This game is all about exploration and discovering the hidden secret behind the most well known place in the world. As well as relaxing because you were invited to start a new live in here.

In the "In'rr Castle".
